originalText.text: Dr. Shahzad treated my husband with the utmost skill. He is a brilliant surgeon who is genuinely compassionate. This true gentleman combines expertise and grace, which placed him above and beyond our expectations. My husband required an extremely delicate and detailed reconstruction after his laryngectomy. Dr. Shahzad explained everything precisely and answered our questions directly. Our gratitude is infinite.

originalText.text: Dr. Farooq Shahzad is an excellent physician / surgeon.  My husband was diagnosed with an extremely aggressive oral cancer and Dr. Shahzad took the time to explain everything in detail.  His knowledge and expertise  in dealing with this type of cancer and bedside manner are excellent.   Highly recommend.  Truly a Healthcare Hero.
